title: Get rid of scammers
body: I have a great idea for trading. You have a button in gifting that says trade and you both have to get mystery skin or mystery champion, and you both have to click trade and the function will work. In the feature you can show their rp and you can see their summoner name, and the gift their gifting you. This would be a great feature to stop scammers winning. So please take this advice in ur hands and lets get rid of Scammers!!

replies.body:
But trading goes against their morals, apparently.

Good idea, though. Kinda like Steam. I like it.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations
No no i was talking to RIOT Pip and he said it was a great idea.

Oh, I was under the impression that gift trading was against Riot's policy, with the whole "you can't gift a person who you only added a week ago" of yonder past. Do you have the actual quote/source of RIOT Pip saying that?

Pip (Riot Games Player Support)
May 17, 15:15

That's a nice idea my friend. We really appreciate helping this community to evolve positively. We've established forums where you can submit feedback and advice with regarding the current state of the game. We check the forums everyday for constructive suggestions, so we can make the game better.

I like this idea too, but HORSE OF FORCE does bring up a good point regarding the time limit before you can gift another player, so there may reasons why you still wouldn't be able to "gift swap" with someone not yet on your friend list.

Still, I'll pass this suggestion on!

It can be like normal trading, just a different tab in it, Champions, Skins, MysterySkin, MysteryChampion, Ward Skin, Icons, Trading, and it can also be only trade 5 times a day like the normal trading system.

Hm...

Interesting.

What board was this on?
